description: Test Management Software for test plans, test cases with integrated test management environment that enables you to perform black-box tests, white-box tests, regression tests or change management tests of software applications. Zeta Test Management helps you to plan, perform, log, monitor and document the tests, and then to evaluate the test results. Test your software with test scripts that you created with Zeta Test Management.
summary: Test and Requirements Management Software for Windows and Web.
author: Zeta Software GmbH
